revised_title: Mervyn Henry Gordon: A Pioneering Medical Bacteriologist
tldr: Mervyn Henry Gordon was a prominent medical bacteriologist who dedicated his career to research in the field of medical science. He made significant contributions to the study of streptococci, meningitis, and virus diseases, including the classification of streptococci, the identification of serological types in meningococci, and the study of viruses like vaccinia and variola. His work in air hygiene and the investigation of cerebrospinal fever during World War I also had a major impact on public health.
